intent_atoms.description: Validation metadata must be present in ParseTree, JSON exports, and session snapshots to convey active preset and disabled rules.
Persist validation configuration defaults and workspace overrides; expose preset/rule operations via DocumentSessionController.
Provide a macOS ValidationSettingsView scene that allows users to switch scopes, select presets, toggle individual rules, and reset workspace overrides.
The ValidationSettingsView must correctly switch scopes, allow preset selection, enable rule toggling, and support resetting workspace overrides.

functional_units.name: Validation Metadata Support
functional_units.description: Adds validation metadata to ParseTree, JSON exports, and session snapshots so consumers can identify active preset and disabled rules.

functional_units.name: Persistence of Validation Configuration Defaults
functional_units.description: Stores default validation configuration settings and allows workspace overrides.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController Preset/Rule Operations
functional_units.description: Exposes operations for managing presets and rules through the DocumentSessionController API.

functional_units.name: macOS ValidationSettingsView Scene
functional_units.description: Provides a UI scene to switch scopes, select presets, toggle individual rules, and reset workspace overrides.
